about_the_game:
Desperate to rescue his daughter, Eric Preston journeys to a cabin deep in the Canadian wilderness to discover an ancient evil that awaits his arrival.

Assuming the role of this desperate father, players are tasked with solving the the mystery of his daughter's disappearance while warding off the evils that have been unleashed. Faced with tense stealth and close quarters combat, players must collect clues and solve puzzles to discover the truth that lies behind this cabin.

Will you save your daughter in time or will her suffering mean the end of days?

content_descriptors.notes: Strong language and alcohol references. Violence, gore, and frightening images throughout.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A first person horror game where the player must use stealth and wits to escape the evil that faces them. This tense and story driven experience will leave the player terrified, but excited to explore the mysteries that surround them.
